CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Use_to_Calculate_ROW_1__c, "yes"), Order_Quantity_1__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Use_to_Calculate_ROW_2__c, "yes"), Order_Quantity_2__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Use_to_Calculate_ROW_3__c, "yes"), Order_Quantity_3__c, IF(ISPICKVAL(Use_to_Calculate_ROW_4__c, "yes"), Order_Quantity_4__c,null ))))
CustomField.label: Order Quantity
